name: 劉建浩
objective: 本課程介紹作業研究中非線性模式之各項基本概念及應用，包含整數規劃、動態規劃、賽局原理、馬可夫鏈、等候原理、存貨模式、專案管理、模擬等。
schedule:
Week 1-3
The Transportation and Assignment Problem
Week 4-6 
Network Optimization Models
Week 7-8
Dynamic programming
Week 9
	Mid-term test
Week 10-12
	Integer Programming
Week 13
	Nonlinear Programming
Week 14
	Decision Analysis
Week 15 
	Markov Chains
scorePolicy:
小考 20%
作業 10%
期中考 30%
期末考 40%
materials:
Introduction to operations research (McGraw Hill)
Frederick S. Hillier
Gerald J. Lieberman
